name: MatchBreaker
description:
Play as hero "Earong", wreaking havoc over lovely rhyming pairs, in this mouse-based word game. 

Puzzles involve moving 1 or 2 letters in a set of words, so that each word either rhymes or doesn't rhyme.  Goals vary across levels.

Requires a  reasonably-large screen, and a mouse.  (Sorry, no touch controls yet...)

This is my first game jam entry - also my first week learning Unity.

Some quality-of-life tips (no major spoilers):

  • Letters can be S P R E  A D        O U T on the shelf. They don't need to be close together.
  • If you're stumped by a puzzle,  use the reset button (circular arrow) on the top right corner of the screen  to reset the puzzle. Often, the initial state of the puzzle is closer to the optimal solution than you'd think.
  • The game's word list includes names , not just dictionary terms. However, none of the solutions require you to build a "word that is only used as a name".
